title: Navigate forwards to a switch in the off state in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.

title: Navigate backwards to a switch in the off state in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.

title: Navigate forwards to a switch in the on state in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.

title: Navigate backwards to a switch in the on state in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.

title: Request information about a switch in the off state in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Notifications' switch, read information about the switch.

title: Request information about a switch in the on state in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Notifications' switch, read information about the switch.

title: Operate a switch in the off state in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Notifications' switch, change its state to 'on'.

title: Operate a switch in the on state in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Notifications' switch, change its state to 'off'.
